grails.plugin.cache.ehcache.hibernate
[Java] Class BeanEhcacheRegionFactory

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.ehcache.hibernate.AbstractEhcacheRegionFactory
      net.sf.ehcache.hibernate.EhCacheRegionFactory
          grails.plugin.cache.ehcache.hibernate.BeanEhcacheRegionFactory

public class BeanEhcacheRegionFactory
extends net.sf.ehcache.hibernate.EhCacheRegionFactory

Use the existing ehCache CacheManager instance instead of creating a new instance. For use with Hibernate 3.x (use grails.plugin.cache.ehcache.hibernate.BeanEhcacheRegionFactory4 with Hibernate 4.0+). Configure in DataSource.groovy: hibernate.cache.region.factory_class = 'grails.plugin.cache.ehcache.hibernate.BeanEhcacheRegionFactory

Authors:
Craig Andrews
Burt Beckwith
